an4.80:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.80:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.80:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.80:5.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena mātugāmo neva sabhāyaṃ nisīdati, na kammantaṃ payojeti, na kambojaṃ gacchatī”ti?
an4.80:5.6: ayaṃ kho, ānanda, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yena mātugāmo neva sabhāyaṃ nisīdati, na kammantaṃ payojeti, na kambojaṃ gacchatī”ti.
